item.title: Sprout Track
item.description:
Sprout Track

A tracker to track baby diapers, feedings, naps, pumping, and other activities.
Alternative to Baby Buddy?
item.content:encoded:

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01K4D6QF7SC0HKYYJXNZE8M6ND
item.description:
From Senate website: web.senate.gov.ph/∞

Senator Bam Aquino filed Senate Bill No. 1330 to establish a National Budget Blockchain System that will make every peso of public funds traceable, transparent, and auditable in real time. The measure tasks DICT, DBM, and COA to create a blockchain-based system with a public portal, enabling citizens and oversight bodies to monitor budget allocations and prevent hidden or fraudulent projects.

Oh great, because what the national budget really needs is a sprinkling of blockchain magic—surely the same tech behind rug pulls, pump-and-dumps, and “decentralized” scams will finally fix government accountability.
item.content:encoded:
From Senate website: web.senate.gov.ph/∞

Senator Bam Aquino filed Senate Bill No. 1330 to establish a National Budget Blockchain System that will make every peso of public funds traceable, transparent, and auditable in real time. The measure tasks DICT, DBM, and COA to create a blockchain-based system with a public portal, enabling citizens and oversight bodies to monitor budget allocations and prevent hidden or fraudulent projects.

Oh great, because what the national budget really needs is a sprinkling of blockchain magic—surely the same tech behind rug pulls, pump-and-dumps, and “decentralized” scams will finally fix government accountability.

item.title: Deploy a static WordPress site on Cloudflare pages
item.description:
Deploy a static WordPress site on Cloudflare pages

In this guide, you will use a WordPress plugin, Simply Static, to convert your existing WordPress site to a static website deployed with Cloudflare Pages.
item.content:encoded:
Deploy a static WordPress site on Cloudflare pages

In this guide, you will use a WordPress plugin, Simply Static, to convert your existing WordPress site to a static website deployed with Cloudflare Pages.

item.title: Nginx Server Manager
item.description:
Nginx Server Manager

A modern, web-based nginx management platform for effortless site deployment, SSL certificate management, and file operations
Basically, a direct alternative to NPM (Nginx Proxy Manager)
item.content:encoded:
Nginx Server Manager

A modern, web-based nginx management platform for effortless site deployment, SSL certificate management, and file operations
Basically, a direct alternative to NPM (Nginx Proxy Manager)

item.title: Time Tracker
item.description:
Time Tracker

A robust, self-hosted time tracking application designed for teams and freelancers who need reliable time management without cloud dependencies. Built with Flask and optimized for Raspberry Pi deployment, TimeTracker provides persistent timers, comprehensive reporting, and a modern web interface.
item.content:encoded:
Time Tracker

A robust, self-hosted time tracking application designed for teams and freelancers who need reliable time management without cloud dependencies. Built with Flask and optimized for Raspberry Pi deployment, TimeTracker provides persistent timers, comprehensive reporting, and a modern web interface.

item.title: Watch Digest
item.description:
Watch Digest

WatchDigest is a monitoring tool that scans local Docker containers, checks whether their images are outdated, and optionally updates those images. It can notify you across a wide range of messaging platforms when updates are available or have been applied.
Watchtower has not been updated for a while now. Maybe this is a good alternative then.
item.content:encoded:
Watch Digest

WatchDigest is a monitoring tool that scans local Docker containers, checks whether their images are outdated, and optionally updates those images. It can notify you across a wide range of messaging platforms when updates are available or have been applied.
Watchtower has not been updated for a while now. Maybe this is a good alternative then.
